episode: I was disappointed when I had to say goodbye to my daughter when she had to return to college from spring break a month ago

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was disappointed when I had to say goodbye to my daughter when she had to return to college from spring break a month ago

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That can be tough, missing your kid when they're away.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: absolutely. It has been hard not seeing her all the time anymore

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's a big adjustment when they leave the nest.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes it is

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sure you're proud of her though.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am proud of her, yes. She has worked so hard and grown as a person

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must make it a little easier to be apart.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes it does. You need to let your kids spread their wings

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: But it's okay to still miss them.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes. It's a part of life I suppose

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Part of letting go, I guess.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes. We all have to do it

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's a bittersweet feeling.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yup. It's so rewarding to see them grow and mature though

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Makes it all worth it, right?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes it does

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's the best part of parenting.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: it is. It's the payoff for all the hard work

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A labor of love, really.
